# hercpanorama

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of hercpanorama is to provide a common set of tools for wrangling and
analyzing the CSV outputs from [Panorama](https://www.panoramaed.com/) reports.

## Installation

You can install the development version of hercpanorama from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("higherX4Racine/hercpanorama")
```
